title: Piet Mondrian Lozenge Composition with Yellow, Black, Blue, Red, and Gray
description:
Keychain developed from Piet Mondrian’s Lozenge Composition with Yellow, Black, Blue, Red and Grey, 1921, from The Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Lozenge Composition with Yellow, Black, Blue, Red, and Gray is deceptively simple; the result of constant adjustment to achieve absolute balance and harmony, it reveals an exacting attention to the subtle relations between lines, shapes, and colors.

A great gift for yourself of a friend.

  • Dimensions of charm:  1.25 x 1.5625 in.
  • Materials: Brass with colored enamel.
